definition: "super plastic" (term used to refer to Teflon)

sentences.english: In this paper, the newest developing of plastic optical fiber is reviewed for various communication.
sentences.chinese: 本文綜述了各種通信用塑料光纖研究的最新進展。

sentences.english: CFRP, after all, is 50 times as expensive as steel.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，碳纖維增強塑料比鋼貴50倍。

sentences.english: Plastic bottles and buckets, even the sole of a shoe are all on display.
sentences.chinese: 塑料瓶和塑料桶，甚至還有鞋底都在那裏展示。

sentences.english: Plastic bottles and buckets, even the sole of a shoe are all on display.
sentences.chinese: 塑料瓶和塑料桶，甚至還有鞋底都在那裏展示。

sentences.english: Free bags, even under other  guises, would be banned.
sentences.chinese: 只要是免費塑料袋，不論以何形式提供都予以禁止。

sentences.english: Only a handful of bridges have major support beams made from them.
sentences.chinese: 只有少數橋樑採用纖維增強塑料的主體支撐梁。

sentences.english: Clean up any beads of mercury by using an index card and plastic dustpan.
sentences.chinese: 用撲索引卡和塑料簸箕清理水銀珠子。

sentences.english: The black plastic will help seal and the weight of the door holds it down.
sentences.chinese: 黑色塑料膜的作用是密封，而門的重量會把它壓住。

sentences.english: They're perfect for closing open plastic bags, such as rice bags.
sentences.chinese: 它們也是修復塑料袋開口的完美選擇，比如米袋。

sentences.english: A local real estate company plastic company personal transport majority.
sentences.chinese: 本地有房產公司塑料公司個人用車居多。

sentences.english: All the cartons are lined with plastic sheets， so they're absolutely water-proof， I can assure you.
sentences.chinese: 所有紙箱都內襯塑料袋，我可以保證絕對防水。

sentences.english: Since the material for plastic and 5, the machine for the rate of 85? 80.
sentences.chinese: 塑料和五金材料自供，整機自供率達85%。

sentences.english: The linear rods are supported by engineered polymer plastic bushings.
sentences.chinese: 線性棒支持的聚合物塑料套管。

sentences.english: Dozens of dead cats were found in plastic bins around the house.
sentences.chinese: 從散落在屋裏的塑料箱內還發現了幾十只貓的屍體。

sentences.english: Just cut a small cross in the plastic at the spot you will drill.
sentences.chinese: 先在塑料板上要鑽孔的地方切一個小十字。

sentences.english: Recently a plastic Santa Claus was ripped off a door.
sentences.chinese: 最近，一個塑料聖誕老人被人從門上撕掉了。

definition: acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
